short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and sync your links with GitHub. Organize your bookmarks with tags and access them anywhere through your GitHub repository.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Companion extension for LinkStack app to sync links from your browser to github which can then later be accessed on your android devices
